How AsapScience make videos?
1. Think about an idea
2. Research: most online, some books; PubMed, Google scholar
3. Have a general script
4. Draw
5. Finalize script
6. Record audio track (do not record with the video)
7. Edit the video and add the audio to the video
8. Add songs (write original music sometimes)

I had no idea you were partners, until the newer video I saw (I'm an idiot, I totally miss that other couples that are couples, too, no matter what gender or non-gender) but in all fairness, I am often listening to a lot of YT videos while doing other things, so don't see the people.)
Then this video popped up and I had to see it -- OMG you're both so young when you started this! I bet you never thought you'd still be doing it this long and be at 9.59 MILLION subscribers! New research from University of Notre Dame Psychology Professor Gabriel Radvansky suggests that passing through doorways is the cause of these memory lapses.

“Entering or exiting through a doorway serves as an ‘event boundary’ in the mind, which separates episodes of activity and files them away,” Radvansky explains.

“Recalling the decision or activity that was made in a different room is difficult because it has been compartmentalized.”

Google "Notre Dame doorways" to read the full story.
